briefTitle: Sensitivity and Predictive Value of Frozen Section of Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy in Post Neoadjuvant Setting
officialTitle: Sensitivity and Predictive Value of Frozen Section of Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy in Post Neoadjuvant Setting
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of patients with discrepant frozen and permanent biopsy results
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Patients greater than 18 years of age
2. All diagnosed breast carcinoma patients ranging from T1 to T4 and N0 to N1, who have received neoadjuvant chemotherapy will be included.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Poorly preserved biopsy material, insufficient to assess all the histological features.
